name: Super Immunizer
description:
You are a lab-engineered immune system supercell, being tested to fight off hostile microbes.

Controls:

  • WSAD = move
  • Shift = move faster
  • Ctrl/Space = move upwards / downwards
  • Click = shoot

Fullscreen recommended!

Post-jam fixes:

  • #1: better mouselook, mouse sensitivity option (in pausemenu)
  • #2: fixed some occasional bugs in the game over and victory screens

Developed by Kostas Ventouras

Graphics by Alkis Tagaras

Music by Giorgos Giannisis
